text.en:
All Siemens studioLine hobs and hoods are designed to perfection - not only in apparence, but also in terms of quality and features.

Explore and choose the features relevant to your cooking style and add the hob and hood to your wishlist in My Kitchen.
text.se:
Alla Siemens studioLine hällar och fläktar är designade till perfektion - inte bara utseende, utan även vad gäller kvalitet och funktioner.

Utforska och välj de funktioner som passar din matlagningsstil och lägg produkterna till din önskelista i My Kitchen

text.en:
The cooking zones automatically adapt to the sizes of your pots and pans, Ø 8-24 cm. Your cooktop knows on its own how large your cookware is. If the limits of one cooking zone are exceeded, additional cooking zones are automatically added and the cookware is always evenly heated. You can also connect two separate cooking zones to form a large one, for more flexibility when cooking, perfect with teppanyaki and gridle pan. Available in 80 cm. This model also got “Best in Test” from the Swedish test institut Råd& Rön, 11/2020. 

  • item 1
  • item 2
  • item 3

text.en:
Do you even know what you can do with today´s ovens? It can be more then just an regular oven.

Do you know the advantages of having 2 ovens - makes it possible to make 2 dishes it different temperatures at once. Cook the meat gently in one oven and make the potatoe gratain in the other and the dinner will be ready at the same time.

We´ll show you the features with real life examples. Select the functions you are interested in and we'll recommend you the perfect oven or package.
